alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Kanawha; Putnam (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 2:24PM EDT until July 13 at 2:45PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: The National Weather Service in Charleston West Virginia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Kanawha County in central West Virginia... East central Putnam County in western West Virginia... South central Jackson County in northwestern West Virginia... * Until 245 PM EDT. * At 224 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Poca, or near Winfield, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Charleston, Winfield, Sissonville, Poca, Cross Lanes and Bancroft. This includes Interstate 77 in West Virginia between mile markers 109 and 119. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
